definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

pinyin: duo1 xing2 he2 bai2 xi4 bao1

sentences.english: Leukocyte telomere length (LTL) reflects not only chronologic age but also the burden of disease. We hypothesized that LTL would be decreased in children with OSA.
sentences.chinese: 白细胞端粒长度不仅反映年龄变化而且反映疾病负担。

sentences.english: In our study, the incidence of leukocytosis and leukopenia was independent of the degree of plasma concentration.
sentences.chinese: 氯氮平所致白细胞计数异常现象与血药浓度高低无关。

sentences.english: Emigration refers to the process by which motile white cells escape from the blood vessels to the perivascular tissues.
sentences.chinese: 游出是指白细胞从血管内进入血管周围组织的过程。

sentences.english: Alterations occur at the interface between white blood calls and endothelium.
sentences.chinese: 白细胞和内膜的交界面发生改变。

sentences.english: Honeysuckle can accelerate lymphocyte transformation and strengthen phagocytic function of white blood cell.
sentences.chinese: 金银花能促进淋巴细胞转化，增强白细胞的吞噬功能。

sentences.english: OPPV was not isolated from peripheral leucocytes of seropositive sheep.
sentences.chinese: 从血清学阳性羊的外周血白细胞未分离到OPPV。

sentences.english: The reduction in white blood-cell counts lowers resistance to disease.
sentences.chinese: 白细胞计数减少会降低对疾病的抵抗力。

sentences.english: Honey helps in fighting bacterial and viral and strengthens White blood corpuscles in blood.
sentences.chinese: 蜂蜜帮助抵抗细菌和病毒并加强血液中的白细胞。

sentences.english: The amount and quality of leucocytes is a important gist in the clinical diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 人体白细胞的计数和质量是临床诊断的重要依据。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, serum levels of immunoglobulins and interleukins were tested.
sentences.chinese: 同时检测血清免疫球蛋白及白细胞介素。

sentences.english: Objective To cure the RA using Leuco-PE.
sentences.chinese: 目的用去白细胞去血浆疗法治疗类风湿关节炎。

sentences.english: Interleukin1 activity was measured by mouse thymocyte proliferation assay.
sentences.chinese: 白细胞介素1活性采用小鼠胸腺细胞增殖法测定。

sentences.english: The increase in monocytes was accompanied by an increase in superoxides in the blood vessels.
sentences.chinese: 白细胞数量的增加是由血管中超氧化物增加引起的。

sentences.english: The practice of removing the white cells from blood is called leukoreduction.
sentences.chinese: 从血液中去除白细胞称为减白血球。

sentences.english: Does leucocyte decrease what to harm have to the body?
sentences.chinese: 白细胞减少对身体有什么危害？

sentences.english: This article reports the effects of pure Astragalus preparation(PAP) in treating 115 cases of leucopenia.
sentences.chinese: 用纯黄芪制剂治疗白细胞减少症115例。

definition: neutrophil (the most common type of white blood cell)

pinyin: shi4 suan1 xing4 li4 xi4 bao1

definition: hemogram/picture of blood used in medical research
hematin (blood pigment)/heme/hemoglobin/also written 血紅蛋白|血红蛋白
